text: Timescape is a 1980 science fiction novel by Gregory Benford. Timescape may also refer to: *Timescape Books, a short lived imprint of Pocket Books, named after the Benford novel * "Timescape" (Star Trek: The Next Generation), an episode from the sixth season of the television series Star Trek: The Next Generation *Timescape (film), a 1992 American science fiction film directed by David Twohy *Timescape Zero, American metalcore band *Project Timescape, education center at the Wittenham Clumps, England
title: Timescape (disambiguation)
